mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notification(bno, rno, username, type) values(#{bno}, #{rno}, #{username}, #{type})
mapper.select: select noti_reply.nno, read_flag, regdate, rno, type, reply, bno, title from (select nno, read_flag, tbl_notification.rno, tbl_notification.regdate, type, reply from tbl_notification left join tbl_reply on tbl_notification.username=#{username} and tbl_notification.delete_flag='0' and tbl_notification.rno=tbl_reply.rno) as noti_reply join (select nno, tbl_notification.bno, title from tbl_notification left join tbl_board on tbl_notification.username=#{username} and tbl_notification.delete_flag='0'and tbl_notification.bno=tbl_board.bno) as noti_board on noti_reply.nno=noti_board.nno order by nno desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(nno) from tbl_notification where username=#{username}
mapper.update: update tbl_notification set read_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}
update tbl_notification set delete_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}
